meanings.definition: people who are capable of perceiving through the senses
meanings.sent1: The sensates enjoyed the beautiful music with their ears.
meanings.sent2: She met other sensates who appreciated art and nature.
meanings.sent3: The sensates could smell the delicious food from miles away.
meanings.sent4: Their group was like a team of sensates, each with a unique ability.
meanings.sent5: The sensates could feel the warmth of the sun on their skin.

meanings.sent4: The sensates created a sensory-friendly environment for everyone.
meanings.sent5: The sensates appreciated the beauty of the sunset with all their senses.
